Package org.freedesktop.wayland.raw

Class __pthread_mutex_s

java.lang.Object
org.freedesktop.wayland.raw.__pthread_mutex_s
public class __pthread_mutex_s extends Object
struct __pthread_mutex_s {
    int __lock;
    unsigned int __count;
    int __owner;
    unsigned int __nusers;
    int __kind;
    short __spins;
    short __elision;
    __pthread_list_t __list;
}
